title: What music do you listen to while playing?
body:
Everyone has thier own flavour, lets share some :)


post a title of a song and by who or a video. we can create a playlist :)

i get into alot of the monstercat channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ6td3C9QlPO9O_J5dF4ZzA


heres a song that pops up

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tzb0_qQWioQ



**SHARE YOU MUSIC FLAVOUR!**

replies.body:
I have a stupidly large range of music that I listen to when I play games.
Friends love road trips with me. Kappa.

It can range from questionable 90's tastes
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5hUYYAFbd4E

To some classics
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5BmEGm-mraE

To something from the internet
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NCHq0m67lq8

To some Girls Gen
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q_gfD3nvh-8

Then we hit some Aqua
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZyhrYis509A

And we'll cap it off with Hit My Heart
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9iCo4wJsnA
I can't believe I just watched the whole video of aqua hahaha how the fk  did people listen to this song.. A few good songs in your list though
Love it :)
Anything bfmv is usually good to get pumped for yolo queue.

I'm all about the hard rock and metal too :)

A7x and Trivium are probably my favorites.
Post some vids :)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tG_Je_TodiQ
Yeah that's extremely different... Guessing it's asian

Feedback if you want me to send you playlists
Really smooth, i like it alot!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y3Ah9KUH0lA

always more where that came form
Fantastic man, you have good taste in music
Disco. A lot of Disco.
Holy shit disco is amazing, funky fresh beats and lyrics.

How can you solo queue to all this happy rubbish? Unleash the hatred and let the rage flow freely!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=38j-i8jH7xk
I'll play this when i'm using nasus or tryndamrere LOL :)
Ye fuck that

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lXQ2a-K1QRo
10/10 track
Thats so cool!
ahaha I like it :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GV0OxbtM8Z0
Gives me em feels
So sleek LOL
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cK3NMZAUKGw FTW

i've heard of k-poop but is this k-metal.

its really cool.. 
and the video is awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=Exhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=pO4x6jqz,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-07-17T12:47:19.737+0000)
>
> i've heard of k-poop but is this k-metal.
> 
> its really cool.. 
> and the video is awesome.

But this is not Korean, this is a Japanese hybrid of pop and metal.

My current favourite is this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ukgvTE3A0Ic
So good, really uplifting, and who doesnt like guitar!
Either NCS or chill out music like this :) Ncs always a good choice pumping up for a game though, but this link is more passive https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EzjX0QE_l8U

So chill and crisp!

i'm listening to this one over my next few games :)

There's actually a lot of good songs if you stay on the chain of videos.. This is the first time I've bene open to playing music while playing and this seems passive enough to be awesome in the background without distracting:P

Fr√ºhlingsrauschen, Op. 32, No. 3 
[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-StHeHGyakY)

I know someone else who listens to Monstercat, hum.. ^^

Don't judge me. Lately I've been listening to music like this.. at least at the beginnings of games. Coincidentally everything about this song was also made for me. Muahaha.. 
Watch it :)

https://youtu.be/lAwYodrBr2Q
Deep
I listen to the 3 DJ song tracks on shuffle and loop... Sometimes I listen to Sandy Popushii's LoL song parodies... Isn't hearing about a feeding Kalista while laning against one just fun?
https://listenonrepeat.com/?v=3OWdfKkDDb0#Ivan_B_-_Finding_Better_places_%5BFull_Album%5D

Every time I listen to music, my ability to play the game drops dramatically as I find myself clicking and doing things in time with the beat.

Also, being unable to hear in game sound effects such as a TP or whatever bothers me.

edm stuff

here's all my songs
Listening mostly to Dubstep, Nightcore, Nightstep, NCS, Monstercat.

Well when im mmr grinding on singed ill listen to either a 2 hour deadmau5 mix or Cyranek's mlg song remix's (so i can make some dank may may's with my rylai's)

But generic norms game? i dunno generic metal core.

I listen to PANDORA all the time. Pandora is free internet radio, all kinds of music-EVERY thing you could want to hear.
You create radio stations to suit exactly what you like. I have about 70 stations for  a HUGE range of music
|| Indian Raga (Ali Akbar Khan, Ravi Shankar)
|| 20th century classical music (Stravinsky, Xenakis, Hindemith, Bartok)
|| Avant garde jazz (Bad Plus, Wayne Kravitz)
|| Old Skool hip hop
|| Old Skool SOUL, BABY!!
|| crazy guitar stuff
|| Deadmaus + Kaskade
|| Henry Cow...
--------- 
Go to[ www.pandora.com](http://www.pandora.com)
If you don't have an account, create one
---------
Search for a station I created called **League of Legends atmosphere**
That station is all big orchestral cinematic music, fits the epic battles and moods of the game- for me it does.
--------
You might prefer Death metal, or country and western. whatever.
